name: British Dogs
description:
British Dogs - a long text quest, written entirely on enthusiasm. Although the style, and the engine hint at a visual novel, it is a text quest. Here you can hear familiar music from games and movies, such as Frostpunk, Inception.

The story is written with love, it is better to pass in one breath, the full passage requires 40-50 minutes.

You can also play web: http://derision.h1n.ru/works/britishdogs/web/
